content: So we have #general: job postings and now #general: positions. Maybe we should consolidate these?
Yeah! I made up "positions", and I like that name better because it includes positions for grad students. (In Europe they advertise for those.)
'positions' has more than 1000 more subscribers than 'job postings', just fyi - it might be better to keep the newer stream for that reason.
Okay, I'm gonna change the old one.
